materials: Base metal plated with gold with simulated sapphires and CZ diamonds. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: A modern take on the traditional South Indian Kante necklace. Features a graduated design with pear-shaped simulated sapphires, each surrounded by a halo of shimmering cubic zirconia. Central pendant with a larger pear-shaped sapphire framed by CZs, adding a focal point of elegance.
colors: Deep blue (sapphire) and brilliant white (CZ diamonds) against a warm golden base. A classic and versatile color combination.
occasions: or any occasion where you want to add a touch of sophisticated glamour. Suitable for modern and traditional outfits.
description: This Kante beautifully blends contemporary design with classic gemstone colors. The combination of sapphires and diamonds evokes a sense of luxury, while the Hyderabadi polish ensures a long-lasting, radiant finish. Offers the look of fine jewelry at an accessible price point.
